mutants.original_line: most_common_names = [name for name, count in name_counts.items() if count == max_count]
mutants.mutated_line: most_common_names = [name for (name, count) in name_counts.items() if count != max_count]

mutants.original_line: return sorted(most_common_names, key=lambda name: name_counts[name], reverse=True)
mutants.mutated_line: return sorted(most_common_names, key=lambda name: name_counts[name], reverse=False)
